name: NCT03421379_secondaryOutcomeMeasure_2_OG001
title: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Change From Baseline in Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Zero to Time t (AUC [0-tLast]) of Glucagon Nasal Powder and Glucagon Hydrochloride IM at Pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 90, 120, 240 minutes after each glucagon administration for Glucagon Hydrochloride Solution in NCT03421379

note.text: Outcome Measure Population Description: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of study drug and had evaluable PK data.

observed.display: A single dose of 1 mg glucagon hydrochloride solution was administered IM
